title: Novel hybrid thiazoles, bis-thiazoles linked to azo-sulfamethoxazole: Synthesis, docking, and antimicrobial activity
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Mostafa E. Salem, Ismail A. Abdelhamid, Ahmed H.M. Elwahy, Mohamed A. Ragheb, Arwa sultan Alqahtani, Magdi E.A. Zaki, Faisal K. Algethami, Huda Kamel Mahmoud
